com.turn.torrent.tracker.simple

Class SimpleTrackerService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.turn.ttorrent.tracker.TrackerService
      • com.turn.torrent.tracker.simple.SimpleTrackerService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.simpleframework.http.core.Container

    public class SimpleTrackerService
extends TrackerService
implements org.simpleframework.http.core.Container
    Tracker service to serve the tracker's announce requests.

    It only serves announce requests on /announce, and only serves torrents the SimpleTracker it serves knows about.

    The list of torrents TrackerService.torrents is a map of torrent hashes to their corresponding Torrent objects, and is maintained by the SimpleTracker this service is part of. The TrackerService only has a reference to this map, and does not modify it.

    See Also:
    BitTorrent protocol specification

    • Method Detail

      • handle

        public void handle(org.simpleframework.http.Request request,
          org.simpleframework.http.Response response)
        Handle the incoming request on the tracker service.

        This makes sure the request is made to the tracker's announce URL, and delegates handling of the request to the process() method after preparing the response object.

        Specified by:
        handle in interface org.simpleframework.http.core.Container
        Parameters:
        request - The incoming HTTP request.
        response - The response object.
